Bodyweight AutoInjector.name: Bodyweight AutoInjector
Bodyweight AutoInjector.description:
Internal Body Cyberware.

Use an Action to load one dose of Street Drug into a subdermal storage pod. Optionally, one can configure a Biomonitor to automatically dose the user upon entering combat, suffering a critical injury, or reaching a predetermined Wound State threshold.

Gas Jet.name: Gas Jet
Gas Jet.description:
Cyberarm Option. Takes 2 option slots.

Gas Jet sprays a burst of 3 doses of a Street Drug or 3 Vials of Poison/Biotoxin into a 3x3 square directly in front of the shooter (similar to Shotgun Shell attack). Can be used one-handed and is virtually undetectable even without a Conceal check.

All susceptible targets in range suffer the effects of the drug or poison. Targets equipped with gear that neutralizes gas attacks (Nasal Filters & Anti-Smog Breathing Mask) are not affected. Gas Jet must be loaded with 3 more doses after each shot before firing again.

Berserker.name: Berserker
Berserker.description:
Primary Effect

Dose lasts for 10 Minutes.

  • Induces a state of frenzy and increased aggression
  • User takes no Bonus Damage for any Critical Injury
  • Wound State/Facedown penalties to Skill or Stat checks are halved*

Secondary Effect (DV17)

When the dose wears off, the user rolls WILL + Resist Torture/Drugs + 1d10 against Secondary DV.

  • -2 Humanity Loss.
  • User is now addicted to Berserker if not already addicted. +1 to Base Death Save Penalty while addicted.

*This is not supported by the system and must be manually adjusted.

Prime Time.name: Prime Time
Prime Time.description:
Primary Effect

Dose last 4 Hours.

  • Sharpens focus and willpower at the cost of dampened emotions
  • -4d6 Humanity until dose wears off*
  • +2 to COOL and WILL stats. User's max HP not affected by the +2 WILL

* Humanity can not fall under 0 from taking Prime Time

Secondary (DV17)

When the dose wears off, the user rolls WILL + Resist Torture/Drugs + 1d10 against Secondary DV.

  • -1 Humanity Loss
  • -2 to COOL while addicted and not currently dosed with Prime Time.

Sedative.name: Sedative
Sedative.description:
MedTech pharmaceutical.

Applies the Unconscious condition for 4 hours on a willing target. +2 bonus to MechTech Surgery checks on targets dosed with Sedative.

Unwilling target must make a DV15 Resist Torture/Drugs check. On failed check, target is unconscious for 1 minute or 20 rounds in combat. Target wakes upon taking damage. Others can use an Action to awaken target.

Sixgun.name: Sixgun
Sixgun.description:
Leave meatspace behind and supercharge your synapses.

Primary Effect

Dose lasts 4 hours.

  • +2 to Speed while Netrunning
  • -2 To MOVE (Minimum 1)
  • -2 To REF to a (Minimum 1)
  • User does not suffer the penalties of an Unsafe Jack Out unless forced to Jack Out by a program.
  • User can burn 1 Humanity for 1 additional NET Action once per turn.

Secondary (DV17)

Unless under Primary Effect

  • -2 to Speed while Netrunning

Timewarp.name: Timewarp
Timewarp.description:
Primary Effect

Dose lasts 1 minute.

  • +3 to any Initiative Rolls. If already in combat, +3 to current Initiative.

Secondary (DV17)

When the dose wears off, the user rolls WILL + Resist Torture/Drugs + 1d10 against Secondary DV.

  • -2 to Initiative Rolls while addicted if not currently dosed with TimeWarp.

Veritas.name: Veritas
Veritas.description:
Dose lasts 10 minutes.

MedTech pharmaceutical.

Target must make a DV17 Resist Torture/Drugs check. On failed check, target suffers -5 to Acting, Concentration, Conversation, Deduction, Human Perception, and Persuasion Checks

Delaying Compound.name: Delaying Compound
Delaying Compound.description: This additive delays the effects of a Poison or Biotoxin Vial by a minute or an hour. Mixing multiple Delaying Compounds does not increase delay period.

Distilling Compound.name: Distilling Compound
Distilling Compound.description: This additive increases the Resist Torture/Drugs DV of Poison or Biotoxin Vials by 2. Mixing multiple Distilling Compounds does not increase Resist Torture/Drugs DV beyond the initial +2.

Osmosis Compound.name: Osmosis Compound
Osmosis Compound.description:
This additive allows a Vial of Poison or Biotoxin to be absorbed through skin contact. One vial can cover 2 square feet when applied to a surface and lasts for one hour. Can be neutralized by rinsing with water.

The first meat target to touch the affected area with a meat body part is dosed with the poison. A DV17 Perception check reveals the poison. More than one dose in the same 2 square foot area has no added effect.

Suzumebachi Assassin Drone.name: Suzumebachi Assassin Drone
Suzumebachi Assassin Drone.description:
A small wasp-shaped drone designed for silent assassinations.

Stats: 6 MOVE - 7SP - 10HP.

Can be neutralized in 5 min with a DV17 Electronic/Security Tech check.

Default Programming:

  1. Locate target using onboard camera.
  2. Attack target with dartgun until ammo is depleted or target's infrared signature no longer detected
  3. Exfiltrate and return to operator

Drone is commonly controlled with a NET Architecture.

Range:

Perimeter of a NET Architecture-equipped building or 50m/yds away from a portable NET Architecture.

Loadout:

  • Camera with low Light, UV, Infrared modes
  • Dartgun with 8 Biotoxin Arrows
  • Airhypo
